entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
